law.text: It is the purpose of KRS 304.40-260 to 304.40-320 to promote the health and general welfare of the inhabitants of the Commonwealth through the adoption of reforms in health care malpractice claims. Such purpose is hereby declared to be a public purpose for which public funds may be expended.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 322, sec. 17, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1976.
